definition: travel by walking, add a column of numbers
details:
noun
- travel by walking
= example: travel by walking
- the pedal extremity of vertebrates other than human beings
= synonyms: animal foot
- any of various organs of locomotion or attachment in invertebrates
= synonyms: invertebrate foot
- a support resembling a pedal extremity
= example: a support resembling a pedal extremity
- lowest support of a structure
= synonyms: foundation
- the part of the leg of a human being below the ankle joint
= synonyms: human foot, pes
- (prosody) a group of 2 or 3 syllables forming the basic unit of poetic rhythm
= synonyms: metrical foot, metrical unit
- an army unit consisting of soldiers who fight on foot
= example: an army unit consisting of soldiers who fight on foot
= synonyms: infantry
- the lower part of anything
= example: the lower part of anything
- a member of a surveillance team who works on foot or rides as a passenger
- a linear unit of length equal to 12 inches or a third of a yard
= synonyms: ft
verb
- add a column of numbers
= synonyms: foot up
- walk
= synonyms: hoof, leg it, hoof it
- pay for something
= synonyms: pick
